Hi,

The old term Heianjo Sukashi is no longer in use having been replaced =

by Kyo-Sukushi. If you have an older book, you will still see this 
term. =
This also helps avoid confusion with Heianjo tsuba, which are 
typically th=
in iron plates with brass inlays.

Gordon

id 1500s piece. In

equent description.
